mapper.select: select commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser from comments where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by commentDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into comments ( commentNo, commentTitle, commentContents, boardNo, commentDate, commentUser ) values ( COMMENTNO_SEQ.nextval, nvl(#{commentTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, 'null'), #{commentContents}, #{boardNo}, sysdate, #{commentUser} )
